name: Birds and a radio
description:
A funny game where you feed the birds minding your own business listening to DJ minute on the radio and enjoying your surroundings.

this is a small game I made with my spare time afterwork, took about a week to make using unity and playmaker. enjoy.

 VR game made for the Quest 2

 Best enjoyed sitting down

some of the music is created by Danny Vodovos,SUPERARE,  copyright free

birdmodel is by acornbringer

body models by adamhajdu

trees by @craftpix_net
